https://ibis.powerappsportals.com/: Home You’re offline. This is a read only version of the page. Skip to main content Re-Rentals Toggle navigation Home Available Rentals ​ Affordable Studio Apartment - 1034 Kelly Street Recently built studio in Hunts Point, Bronx, featuring an open layout, modern finishes, and plenty of natural light. Located in a well-maintained building with secure entry, close to parks, shops, and public transportation. A great option for affordable and contemporary living in a vibrant neighborhood. Apply Now ​​ 446 Cyrus Place 1-Bedroom Apartment Bright 1-bedroom apartment at 446 Cyrus Place, just minutes from Fordham University, Arthur Avenue, and nearby parks. This home features a modern layout with a full kitchen, great natural light, and is in a well-maintained building close to shopping, dining, and public transportation. Apply Now ​ Luxury 1-bed Apartment - 1015 E Gun Hill Road Modern 1-bedroom apartment available at 1015 E Gun Hill Road in the Bronx. This newly built building features an elevator, on-site laundry, and comfortable living in a convenient location. Don’t miss the chance to apply for this fresh, move-in ready home! Apply Now ​ Convenient 1-bed Apartment - 2325 Beaumont Avenue Live comfortably at 2325 Beaumont Avenue, perfectly situated near local schools, shopping, and dining. With easy access to the 2 and 5 subway lines, residents enjoy seamless connections throughout the city while being part of a vibrant, welcoming Bronx community. Apply Now ​​ Penthouse Studio - 967 East 167th Street Discover this bright studio apartment at 967 East 167th Street in Crotona Park East — a comfortable, modern space perfect for city living. Enjoy an efficient layout, updated finishes, and close proximity to the 2, 5, and 6 trains, neighborhood shops, and parks. Ideal for anyone seeking convenience and comfort in the heart of the Bronx. Apply Now ​​​​​ © 2025 Ibis Advisors LLC. https://east-village-homes-owner-llc.ren: EAST VILLAGE HOMES OWNER LLC | Apartments in NEW YORK, NY Skip Navigation Call us : (646) 970-6802 Menu Home Amenities Floor Plans Photos Map Contact Us Application Form Income Limits Return to Content Resident Login * * Get Directions * * * View Photos * Welcome to the EAST VILLAGE HOMES property website. Applications are now being accepted to fill East Village Homes vacancies and replenish the waiting list. This building was constructed through the Neighborhood Construction Program and Inclusionary Housing Program of the New York City Housing Development Corporation and the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development. Individuals or households who meet the income and household size requirements listed in the table may apply. Qualified applicants will be required to meet additional selection criteria such as asset limits. No application fee. No broker's fee. Smoke-Free Building. To apply online : Applicant Portal To request an application by mail : Send a self-addressed envelope with postage to: East Village Homes c/o Stanton Norfolk Inc P.O. Box 991 New York, NY 10002. Click here to go back to Stanton Norfolk Inc. homepage.
